property.name: resourceContexts
property.description: A collection of contexts for resources.

property.name: application
property.description: The name of an application context.

property.name: relationshipPluginsContexts
property.description: A collection of contexts for relationship plugins.

property.name: customRoutesContexts
property.description: A collection of contexts for custom routes.

property.name: host
property.description: The host name of a server or service.

property.name: resourceType
property.description: The type of a resource.

property.name: getCollection
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'get collection' (list) action of a resource.

property.name: getResourceById
property.description: An annotation for the 'get by ID' action of a resource.

property.name: post
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'create' (POST) action of a resource.

property.name: patch
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'update' (PATCH) action of a resource.

property.name: delete
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'delete' (DELETE) action of a resource.

property.name: resourceType
property.description: The type of a resource.

property.name: resourceAttributesClassName
property.description: The class name for the attributes of a resource.

property.name: resourceType
property.description: The type of a resource.

property.name: pathAnnotation
property.description: An annotation for a path in an API.

property.name: relationships
property.description: A collection of relationships between resources.

property.name: declaredMethods
property.description: A collection of declared methods for a resource.

property.name: parentResources
property.description: A collection of parent resources.

property.name: deprecated
property.description: A flag indicating if a feature or property is deprecated.

property.name: responseAttributesClassName
property.description: The class name for the attributes of a response.

property.name: isIdNullable
property.description: A flag indicating if the ID of a resource can be null.

property.name: requestAttributesClassName
property.description: The class name for the attributes of a request.

property.name: summary
property.description: A summary description of an API endpoint or operation.

property.name: relationshipPluginAnnotationsContext
property.description: Context for annotations of a relationship plugin.

property.name: resourceType
property.description: The type of a resource.

property.name: relationship
property.description: A relationship between two resources.

property.name: pathAnnotation
property.description: An annotation for a path in an API.

property.name: defaults
property.description: Default configuration settings.

property.name: path
property.description: The path for an API endpoint or a file.

property.name: isProtected
property.description: A flag indicating if a resource or route requires authentication.

property.name: refName
property.description: The name of a reference in an API specification.

property.name: in
property.description: The location of a parameter (e.g., 'query', 'header').

property.name: description
property.description: A description of an entity.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: required
property.description: A flag indicating if a parameter or property is required.

property.name: schema
property.description: The schema definition for a data structure.

property.name: type
property.description: The type or category of an entity (e.g., 'allow', 'deny', 'page').

property.name: items
property.description: A collection of items, typically in a cart, order, or list.

property.name: properties
property.description: A collection of properties in a schema.
